block.p: SPRECKELS INDUSTRIES, Pleasanton, Calif., a sugar and industrial manufacturer, has hired the investment banking firm Schroder Wertheim & Co., New York, to help identify possible options, including a sale or merger. FEDERAL REALTY INVESTMENT TRUST, Bethesda, Md., said it had purchased the Bristol Shopping Plaza in Bristol, Conn., for about $19 million. CASINO RESOURCE CORP., Elkhorn, Wis., said it had agreed to buy the Palace Casino in Biloxi, Miss., from Maritime Group Ltd. for $12 million.
